Santa_Monica.Constellation Place:
Constellation Place is a 35-story, 492-foot (150 m) skyscraper in the Los Angeles, California community of Century City. It houses the headquarters of Houlihan Lokey, ICM Partners, and International Lease Finance Corporation (ILFC).
It once housed the corporate headquarters of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM), but MGM moved to Beverly Hills, California after August 19, 2011.
